NewCommentry: Digvesh Singh to Prabhsimran Singh Wicket
Commentry: Digvesh Singh bowling to Prabhsimran Singh, good length ball, pitching outside off stump, Prabhsimran Singh plays a slog sweep WICKET Prabhsimran Singh c Ravi Bishnoi b Digvesh Singh (Punjab Kings 110 Runs for 2 wickets) towards Deep Mid-Wicket
UPDCommentry:
Digvesh Singh bowling to Prabhsimran Singh, A SPECIAL TEAM EFFORT WAS NEEDED TO GET RID OF PRABHSIMRAN AND THEY DID IT SO IN STYLE!  good length ball, pitching outside off stump, Prabhsimran Singh nails the slog sweep to perfection towards mid-wicket, but wait, Badoni Jumps and takes the catch, and all of a sudden loses balance. He throws the ball in the air, and Bishnoi, covering few distance, completes the catch by diving forward. Brilliant Team Work! 

WICKET Prabhsimran Singh c Ravi Bishnoi b Digvesh Singh (Punjab Kings 110 Runs for 2 wickets)

Superb. Smart. Special ????
